articles.description: ZARA AND MIKE TINDALL were the first members of the Royal Family to attend Wimbledon in 2022. However, their body language was 'like teenagers' according to an expert.
articles.content:
“They seem to be mutually spontaneous, which is a feat in itself for any member of the Royal Family.
“This is evenly-balanced affection signalling with mirrored poses and mirrored levels of keenness… [+311 chars]
